title: Monday, December 17. 1660. Whereas the maimed soldiers and pensioners belonging to Ely-house and the Savoy, formerly a great charge to the nation, are by Order of Parliament discharged, and sent with recommendations unto their respective counties and places, where they did last reside, ...
author: England and Wales. Parliament. House of Commons.
publisher: Printed by John Bill, Printer to the King's most Excellent Majestie,
